titleStmt.title: A collection of the works of that holy man and profound divine, Thomas Iackson ... containing his comments upon the Apostles Creed, &c. : with the life of the author and an index annexed.
Selections. 1653
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, 1579-1640.
Oley, Barnabas, 1602-1686.
Vaughan, Edmund.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Norton for Timothy Garthwait ...,

notesStmt.note: Added engraved t.p. has title: A collection of Dr. Jacksons works.
Edited by Barnabas Oley; life of Jackson by Edmund Vaughan, v. 1.
"The eternal truth" (Wing J91) has special t.p., continuous paging.
Imperfect: volumes 2 and 3 are lacking in the filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
